0.2.1.name: wordpress/jfwp-core
0.2.1.description:
jfWP.Core adds functionality to WordPress, this plugin is completely free is developed with PHP 5.3. This software is based on the framework jfPHP.Core.

Blog

http://blog.jeromefath.com/project/jfwp-core/ The project is featured on my blog, documentation and tutorials (in french) are available.

Documentation

http://blog.jeromefath.com/docs/jfwp-core/

Questions

If you have any questions feel free to leave a comment in my blog.
